title: Teemo shrooms destroyed by buying wards (GAMEPLAY)
body: When you place a teemo shroom where an active ward is, or when someone places a ward on top of your shroom, the ward will cause the shroom to detonate upon dying. This can be reproduced by waiting for the ward to time out, or by clearing it.

replies.body:
Hey Sumthinboutbacon,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue and are working on a fix!
I don't think we'll be that lucky. ;)
Are you aware that this bug occur on nidalee's trap too?

> I don't think we'll be that lucky. ;)

Owait its plat.

Seriously, someone needs to fix it. It's soooooo bad this year.
another bug is that any aoe ability for example quinn's Q doesnt give cs count towards cull. i'd have games where i'd have 130-140 cs but still the cull passive doesn't pop.
